project.title: ProtoTag
project.description: Prototype video tagging program used to incubate ideas and schemas for MetaTagDB. Supports time-coded annotations, sidecar JSON, forensic hashes, and export to MetaTagDB-compatible formats.
project.blurb: Prototype video tagging tool for time-coded annotations and MetaTagDB schema research.

versions.notes: Initial proof-of-concept release with JSON sidecars and export to MetaTagDB schema.
